description: Number of chiral n-ominoes in n-1 space.
comments: Lunnon's DR(n,n-1)-DE(n,n-1). Knuth describes methodology for a similar enumeration, that of free trees with n nodes.
references: W. F. Lunnon, Counting Multidimensional Polyominoes, Computer Journal, Vol. 18 (1975), pp. 366-67.
D. E. Knuth, Fundamental Algorithms, 3d Ed. 1997, pp. 386-88.
links: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
author: _Robert A. Russell_
